As a lifestyle med doc, I preach @aclifemed Pillars:
Eat plants🌿 
Keep moving🏃
Sleep well🛌
Be present🙋
Stay calm🧘
Love people👪
I chose 2 take #covid19 #vaccine bcos I ❤️ & care 4 my patients, friends, family & community #believeinscience #grateful #emotional @deptvetaffairs https://t.co/pEPeYmd1lY
